titles.title: A resolution designating the week beginning May 20, 2007, as "National Hurricane Preparedness Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/24/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses support for the President's goals in proclaiming the week beginning May 20, 2007, as National Hurricane Preparedness Week. Encourages the people of the United States to be prepared for the upcoming hurricane season and to promote awareness of the dangers of hurricanes.
